description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924; head and shoulders of man in the foreground with smaller figures over his left and right shoulders; eyes, lips, and part of his forehead colored with green ink
inscription: LL in purple conté pastel pencil, below image: Probedruck I. | LL of sheet in purple conté pastel pencil: Herrn Dr. Rauert herzlich. | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Dr. Rauert E.155-163 B | lower center of sheet, in pencil: 1095 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 1896 | URC of sheet in purple conté pastel pencil, on verso: Dr. Rauert - [illegible]
portfolio: From Plate 1 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
signed: LR in purple conté pastel pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 23
title: Man in Room (Self-Portrait), Plate 1 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
